rooms.description: Vastu compliant entrance facing the east direction for positive energy. Minimalistic yet bohemian style with natural colors.
Spacious living area with a blend of modern and bohemian elements, featuring an open plan with stone and wooden accents to align with Vastu principles.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the living area, designed to encourage family gatherings and positive energy flow according to Vastu.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances integrated in a bohemian style. Kitchen window positioned to ensure ventilation from the south as per Vastu recommendations.
Luxurious master bedroom oriented in the north-west direction with natural light and calming colors in line with Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom designed for relaxation and positive energy flow, ideally placed on the east side to harness early morning sunlight.
Third bedroom with ample natural light, adhering to Vastu principles by ensuring minimal clutter and a tranquil environment.
Master bathroom attached to the master bedroom, featuring water elements arranged according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large door with bohemian-inspired glass accents. Designed for positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
High windows in living and dining areas to allow ample natural light, enhancing Vastu compliance by ensuring balanced ventilation.
Balcony door that opens towards the west for an extended living space with a view of the swimming pool area.

additional_features.description: Outdoor swimming pool designed on the western side. The pool is integrated with natural landscaping to complement the bohemian cottage theme and Vastu principles for water element placement.
A shaded veranda area that connects the living room to the outdoors, ensuring adequate ventilation as recommended by Vastu norms.
